pages.text: After you gathered some ore chunks, you will need some stone to craft a furnace and use that to build a foundry which can melt and cast several things.
pages.title: Foundry Chapter I

pages.text: The first piece of the Foundry I, is a stone crucible, which will hold all the moletn metal in the structure.
pages.title: Stone Crucible

pages.text: The second piece is the stone casting vessel, which will be used for holding the shapes that you will cast in.
pages.title: Stone Casting Vessel

pages.text: The last piece is a regular old furnace
pages.title: The Good ol'

pages.name: Foundry Tier I
pages.text: Use the book to visualise how to build the Foundry, and then you can go smelt your ores :3
